name: data type validation for order fields
scenarioId: petstore/post_place_order:data type validation for order fields
methodName: data type validation for order fields

testSteps.description:
When the "customer" places an order with the following data:
| id | petId | quantity | shipDate | status | complete |
| abcde | xyz | two | invalid-date | unknown | notbool |

children.description: customer executes a POST on the resource /store/order

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Date: Thu, 08 Jan 2026 21:35:42 GMT
Content-Type: application/json
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Connection: keep-alive
Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *
Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET, POST, DELETE, PUT
Access-Control-Allow-Headers: Content-Type, api_key, Authorization
Server: Jetty(9.2.9.v20150224)

testSteps.description: Then the response status should be 500
And the response should contain error messages indicating invalid data types for each field

userStory.narrative:
As a consumer of the API
  I want to be able to place an order for a pet in the Petstore

title: data type validation for order fields
